paragraphs.body: The Track Team was a duo made up of ${link_0} and ${link_1}. Together, they composed the music of ${link_2} and ${link_3}.
paragraphs.text: The Track Team was a duo made up of Jeremy Zuckerman and Benjamin Wynn. Together, they composed the music of Avatar: The Last Airbender and The Legend of Korra.

paragraphs.body: Founded in 2004, the Track Team was a "purveyor of artistically and technologically innovative audio in the realms of television, film, commercials and video games".
paragraphs.text: Founded in 2004, the Track Team was a "purveyor of artistically and technologically innovative audio in the realms of television, film, commercials and video games".

paragraphs.body: At the time the Track Team was beginning its commercial career, Benjamin Wynn was a roommate of Avatar co-creator ${link_0}, so they became a logical choice to be in charge of the soundtrack for the series. The creators approached the Track Team with the request to write the music of Avatar, using a diverse group of instruments. Complying with this wish, the group of musicians used for the score consists of western orchestra blended with Chinese percussion, a mandolin, occasionally a Chinese flute, many other Chinese instruments, and sometimes a choir.
paragraphs.text: At the time the Track Team was beginning its commercial career, Benjamin Wynn was a roommate of Avatar co-creator Bryan Konietzko, so they became a logical choice to be in charge of the soundtrack for the series. The creators approached the Track Team with the request to write the music of Avatar, using a diverse group of instruments. Complying with this wish, the group of musicians used for the score consists of western orchestra blended with Chinese percussion, a mandolin, occasionally a Chinese flute, many other Chinese instruments, and sometimes a choir.

paragraphs.body: There were very few times when a cue was completely rejected by the creators; Zuckerman stated in an interview that he and Wynn enjoyed a lot of creative freedom. The uncommon understanding is due to the fact that Bryan Konietzko is a composer himself.
paragraphs.text: There were very few times when a cue was completely rejected by the creators; Zuckerman stated in an interview that he and Wynn enjoyed a lot of creative freedom. The uncommon understanding is due to the fact that Bryan Konietzko is a composer himself.

paragraphs.body: Together, the duo produced the music for the critically acclaimed series Avatar: The Last Airbender, and their work on the show earned them a 2008 Peabody Award. Their most recent work was the The Legend of Korra soundtrack, which had been produced alongside sound designer Steven Tushar and sound effects editor Christopher Nuno.
paragraphs.text: Together, the duo produced the music for the critically acclaimed series Avatar: The Last Airbender, and their work on the show earned them a 2008 Peabody Award. Their most recent work was the The Legend of Korra soundtrack, which had been produced alongside sound designer Steven Tushar and sound effects editor Christopher Nuno.

paragraphs.body: In June 2017, the partnership was dissolved and the duo went their separate ways.
paragraphs.text: In June 2017, the partnership was dissolved and the duo went their separate ways.
